QuoteTube Beta fr.klemek.quotetube Your quotes Search for video Create new quote (1/2) Create new quote (2/2) Edit quote Loading… Checking permissions… Checking QPython… Downloading QPython… Please uninstall QPython Installing QPython… Initializing QPython… Checking folders Loading user\'s data Checking Youtube-dl… (long) Installing Youtube-dl… Upgrading Youtube-dl… Loading FFmpeg… Launching… About Your quote list is empty,\ntry creating a new quote with the button below. Delete quote ? Do you really want to delete the quote \'%s\' ? About QuoteTube Version : %s\n Developer : Klemek\n Icons : FontAwesome\n Libs : \n -GeometricProgressView (Bohush)\n -FFmpegAndroid (Writingminds)\n -Colorpicker (Jrummyapps)\n -Material-dialogs (Afollestad)\n -Picasso (Squareup)\n Search for video Please search something with the bar above You don\'t seem to be connected There is no results for this search %s views %s ⬆ %s ⬇ -0.2s -0.5s -1s +0.2s +0.5s +1s Limits When you try the quote, the stop position may not be accurate because of the youtube player. You may have to adjust by creating the quote again. Start at : Set start Go to Stop at : Set stop Position : Duration : Try quote Stop Validate positions Options Button preview Fade out 1 second before end Set name Create quote Creating… Downloading…\n(This might take a while) Extracting… Cutting… Cleaning… Adding to list… Source videon

Title : %s
Author : %s
Date : %s

Watch Appearance Delete Save Close OK Cancel Yes No QPython 1.2.5 not installed In order to run this app you must install a specific version of QPython that will be downloaded now. Ok, do it ! Not connected You need to be connected to the Internet to finish installing You need to be connected to the Internet to download the sound FFmpeg failed loading Your device does not support FFmpeg, you will not be able to create new quotes. Youtube-dl installation failed Please check the following:\n -You are connected to the Internet.\n -You have enough space on your device. The quote length must be less than %.1f s Please set a name to your quote Error Error %d : \n%s You have another version of QPython, please uninstall it in order to use this app. (We need the version 1.2.5 that will be downloaded after) Wrong version of QPython Never ! Unexpected error An unexpected error has occured : %s Storage permission denied QuoteTube need storage permission to store the quotes and execute python scripts. Are you sure you want to deny this permission ? QuoteTube need storage permission to store the quotes and execute python scripts. Pease go to your settings to change it. Re-Try I\'m sure
